description: Schema definitions for clue step templates. These capture data from the clue - they have NO knowledge of presentation/process, ONLY knowledge of the clue itself.

standard_definition.description: Captures which words in the clue are the definition and where they appear

expected.description: Which words in the clue are the definition

text.description: The definition text extracted from those positions

position.description: Where in the clue the definition appears

explicit.description: Whether the definition is straightforward (true) or cryptic (false)
